casebody.data:
In re Trudy WADE. No. 717P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Michael Crowell, Raleigh, for Trudy Wade. Susan K. Nichols, Alexander McC. Peters, Karen E. Long, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for Board of Elections. Larry Moore, Greensboro, for John Parks.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2006 by Petitioner (Trudy Wade) to Suspend the Rules:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."

Justices PARKER, EDMUNDS and MARTIN recused.
